FATAL_ERROR: Something went wrong, please reload the page
NOT_ENOUGH_FUNDS_WARNING: You will have less than 0.1 ETH left in your wallet. Make sure you have enough funds for gas fees.
DEPOSIT_WARNING: Sorry, there was a problem depositing. Try again later.

GUIDE.MODAL_TEXT: Would you like to take a look at some of the basic features of Ethen? This guide is available from the menu at any time.
GUIDE.WALLET: If your wallet is connected it will be automatically detected in the top bar. You can also paste your private key directly into the field. It will not be stored anywhere and will disappear after you leave the page.
GUIDE.TOKEN: Choose a token from the drop-down list to start trading.
GUIDE.BALANCE_TABLE:
The table shows the amount of Ether and/or tokens you have in your wallet and on the exchange.

The figures are highlighted in blue when your balance changes after deposit or withdrawal. If you don’t have sufficient funds for the transaction they will be highlighted in red.
GUIDE.BALANCE_TABS:
To start trading choose Ether or the tokens selected in the top bar that you want to send to the smart contract account. You will be asked to approve the amount of Ether/tokens you want to deposit.

Transferred funds are locked on the smart contract ensuring no third-party access.
GUIDE.WITHDRAW: You can get them back at any time in the ‘Withdraw’ tab.
GUIDE.TRANSFER: ‘Transfer’ tab allows you to send tokens to any other wallet address.
GUIDE.PROCESSING_TX: While a transaction is being processed you will see a loader next to your balance. Clicking on it will take you to https://etherscan.io/ with the transaction details and status.
GUIDE.CHART: Scalable Candle Stick chart for the selected token.
GUIDE.ORDER_BOOK: The order book displays all available buy and sell orders.
GUIDE.OWN_ORDERS: Use the checkbox to highlight your open orders.
GUIDE.NEW_ORDER: Place a sell/buy order by entering the amount, or click on a pair from the order book to automatically fill in the values.
GUIDE.TRADES:
TheAll tab shows all trades from the past 24 hours with the link to etherscan.io where you can check transaction details.

My trades shows all your completed trades.

Orders shows all your open orders, and allows you to cancel them.

SUBSCRIBE_BODY: Our subscribers will get a chance to win zero-fee trading for 6 months
PLACE_ORDER_REST: Place an order for the rest?
NAME: Name
PARTIAL_CLOSE: Attention! Partial close of the order
DISCLAIMER_TEXT: Ethen is a decentralized exchange platform to trade Ethereum and ERC20 tokens directly with other users. Users are responsible for their accounts, funds, and private keys. Ethen does not hold users’ funds and does not keep their personal information. Ethen is not responsible for the actions that might incur loss of funds as a result of the user's trading decisions. Ethen cannot guarantee that the tokens traded on the exchange are legally validated, technically feasible and profitable.
SIGN_DATA_TEXT: Sign the data using your wallet
LOADING_ERROR: Sorry, there was a problem during loading. Try again later.
UNLOCK_WALLET_ERROR: Please unlock your wallet or use private key (not recommended)
PLEASE_SIGN_MESSAGE: Please sign this message to authenticate
WITHDRAW_ERROR_CLOSE_ORDERS: Cancel your open orders to withdraw this amount.
WITHDRAW_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH: Not enough funds in Ethen wallet
MOVE_FUNDS_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH: Not enough funds on selected wallet
AUTH_NEEDS: You need to authenticate for this action
ORDER_SIZE_SMALL: Order size is too small. Minimum size is {size}
WALLET_LOCKED: Your wallet is locked. Please unlock it
INSTALL_INSTRUCTION: Please install MetaMask extension, connect a Ledger Wallet, or use your private key to start trading. Instructions on connecting your wallet can be found in the FAQ section.
LEDGER_INSTRUCTION: Please connect your Ledger. The instructions can be found in the FAQ section
NO_METAMASK: Looks like you don't have MetaMask extension
METAMASK_INSTRUCTION:
Please install MetaMask extension.
The instructions can be found in the FAQ section
